sentences.en: But the president is unlikely to deplete his political capital completely.
sentences.cn: 不过,这位总统似乎并未完全耗尽自己的政治资本.

sentences.en: Chlorofluorocarbons can deplete ozone, hydrochlorofluorocarbons and hydrofluorocarbons are regarded as contributors to global warming.
sentences.cn: 氯氟烃破坏臭氧层, 其替代物氢氯氟烃和氢氟烃却被认为可加重温室效应.

sentences.en: Elastic collisions deplete very little of the electron's energy.
sentences.cn: 弹性碰撞中电子减少的能量非常少.

sentences.en: Environmentalists argue that large - scale sand - dredging can deplete fish stocks and cause erosion, risking landslides and flooding.
sentences.cn: 环境保护主义者认为,大规模的挖沙可能导致鱼群减少甚至灭绝, 并伴有山体滑坡和洪水的危险.

sentences.en: Evapotranspiration may deplete the soil moisture and rob supplies of ground water.
sentences.cn: 蒸发蒸腾作用能消耗土壤水分,减少地下水的水量供应.

sentences.en: Excessive fear over a period of time will also deplete Kidney essence.
sentences.cn: 长期的过分恐惧也会导致肾脏精华的损耗.

sentences.en: I have had to deplete my of of my money to pay for the house furnishings.
sentences.cn: 我只好取出了我大部分存款来支付家具费用.

sentences.en: Impoverish the soil overuse . See Synonyms at deplete.
sentences.cn: 过度耕作而使土壤变得贫瘠参见.

sentences.en: It will deplete its cash balance by repaying last week's loan.
sentences.cn: 它会因偿付它上周的借款而耗尽它的现金余额.

sentences.en: Replacing heating element without having to deplete the container.
sentences.cn: 不需要贮罐排空即可更换加热元件.

sentences.en: Salmon populations have been severely depleted .
She had no wish to deplete still further whatever funds he had remaining.
sentences.cn: 她可不愿意再去花掉他剩下的钱.

sentences.en: Surely it is an economic nonsense to deplete the world of natural resources.
sentences.cn: 耗尽世界的自然资源毋庸置疑是愚蠢的经济行为。

sentences.en: The contraceptive pill is the worst offender, but it is not the only drug to deplete the body's vitamin levels.
sentences.cn: 避孕药的危害最大，但是它并不是唯一一种消耗体内维生素的药物。

sentences.en: With a small number of requests, the attacker can deplete the application's thread pool.
sentences.cn: 通过很少数量的请求, 攻击者可以耗尽应用程序的线程池.

words.tran_cn: 使减少；弄空；耗尽…的资源（deplete的过去分词）
耗尽，用尽；使衰竭，使空虚

trans.tran_en: To deplete a stock or amount of something means to reduce it

trans.tran_cn: 倒空； 枯竭； 消耗
trans.tran_en: To deplete a stock or amount of something means to reduce it
